name: Chess Telecom
overview:
Chess is a trusted resource that helps millions of companies nationwide connect with broadband and phone providers and other important services. Chess offers a range of secure, affordable business broadband options. The diversification of telephone technology coupled with the prevalence of affordable mobile phones has caused many business phone providers to offer more service at lower prices in order to compete for your business.

Chess was established in 1993 and offer a suite of communication solutions including business mobile, fixed line and calls, business phone deals, business broadband, EFM, phone systems and other business internet services. We are an award winning communications provider that aim to be a great place to be a customer. We provide our customers with tailored telephone and broadband packages and other services to best suit their needs.
